_header: Ilke a wise wight should wake / And wait with work heaven to win
_description: ‘Mak no Tarijng til to-Morn’ — nine 8-line stanzas with this refrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ilke a wys wiht scholde wakeAnd waite with werk heuen to
                    wynne…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He ȝiue vs grace to wone him byÞen schal vs tyde no
                    teone to Morn

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
Ilke a wys wiht scholde wakeAnd wayte wiþ werke heuen to
                    wynne…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…He ȝeue vs grace to wone him byÞen schal vs tyde no
                    teone to morn
